isis.stitle: BP-R1 BOBTAIL BRAKE PROPORTIONING RELAY VALVE AND LQ-5 BOBTAIL LIMITING VALVE - SERVICE CHECKS - BP-R1 LEAKAGE TEST

step1.para: Build the air system pressure to governor cut-out. With the dash mounted trailer air supply valve activated for tractor/trailer operation, apply a soap solution to all three exhaust ports (two in cover, one in body). Leakage observed should not exceed a one inch diameter bubble in less than three seconds at any exhaust port.

Make and hold a full brake application and apply a soap solution to all three exhaust ports and around the cover where it joins the body. The leakage noted should not exceed a one inch diameter bubble in less than three seconds at any exhaust port.
If the leakage rates are not within the limits the BP-R1 valve should be repaired or replaced.
